channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenSource -- kernel:
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenSource -- kernel:

item.title: CVE-2019-10140|2024-08-04T22:10:09.983Z -- opensource -- kernel%3A
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Linux kernel's, versions up to 3.10, implementation of overlayfs. An attacker with local access can create a denial of service situation via NULL pointer dereference in ovl_posix_acl_create function in fs/overlayfs/dir.c. This can allow attackers with ability to create directories on overlayfs to crash the kernel creating a denial of service (DOS).
